Text:
Thank you. :-)

So sad to see this end, good thing there's another run this year. Hope you will release that too?

what Diva said!!

I just happened to have stumbled on this show, living in the US and all, but it is seriously like one of my all time favorites - i even downloaded what I could of past seasons where I could find them!

Very glad to hear there will be another season and I too, hope very much that you (bigfish) are kind enough to upload it for us!!

Thanks yet again for this and all the many uploads you do for us!!
The official network site has every episode of all seasons available to watch.
